info.title: F5 Distributed Cloud Services API for ves.io.schema.shape.device_id
info.description:
Use this API to interact with Application Traffic Insights endpoitns
All calls allow a blob as the payload and return a blob as the return parameter

post.description: Provision an application for a tenant

401.description: Returned when operation is not authorized

403.description: Returned when there is no permission to access resource

404.description: Returned when resource is not found

409.description: Returned when operation on resource is conflicting with current value

429.description: Returned when operation has been rejected as it is happening too frequently

500.description: Returned when server encountered an error in processing API

503.description: Returned when service is unavailable temporarily

504.description: Returned when server timed out processing request

device_idApplicationProvisionRequest.description: Any payload to be passed on the Application Provision API
device_idApplicationProvisionRequest.title: ApplicationProvisionRequest

body.description:
Data to be send as the body of request. Note that multipart/formdata is not supported. Body described in https://git.shpsec.com/shape-recognize/device-id-management/blob/master/deployment/openapi/openapi-prod.yaml

Example: ` "cGF5bG9hZAo="`
body.title: Body

device_idApplicationProvisionResponse.description: Any payload to be return by Application Provision API
device_idApplicationProvisionResponse.title: ApplicationProvisionResponse

body.description:
Data received from the downstream server

Example: ` "cmVwbHkK"`
body.title: Body

device_idDeleteApplicationsResponse.description: Any payload to be returned by Delete Applications API
device_idDeleteApplicationsResponse.title: DeleteApplicationsResponse

body.description:
Data received from the downstream server. Body is JSON as described in openapi: https://git.shpsec.com/shape-recognize/device-id-management/blob/master/deployment/openapi/openapi-prod.yaml

Example: ` "cmVwbHkK"`
body.title: Body

device_idEnableRequest.description: Any payload to be passed on the Provision API
device_idEnableRequest.title: EnableRequest

region.description:
Target webpage to check src tag injection

Example: ` " ``https://www.example.com`` "`
region.title: Region

device_idEnableResponse.description: Any payload to be return by Provision API
device_idEnableResponse.title: EnableResponse

body.description:
Data received from the downstream server

Example: ` "cmVwbHkK"`
body.title: Body

status.description:
HTTP status as reported by the backend

Example: ` "200`
status.title: Status

device_idValidateSrcTagInjectionRequest.description: Request to verify shape Application Traffic Insights src tag injection
device_idValidateSrcTagInjectionRequest.title: ValidateSrcTagInjectionRequest

src.description:
Content to be present in customer webpage's source

Example: ` " ``https://dip.zeronaught.com/__imp_apg__/js/f5cs-a_aaUvDJvRbA-65bd8ebd.js`` "`
src.title: Src

url.description:
Target webpage to check src tag injection

Example: ` " ``https://www.example.com`` "`
url.title: Url

device_idValidateSrcTagInjectionResponse.description:
Response to indicate whether customer webpage has
custom script tag to track devices been injected or not
device_idValidateSrcTagInjectionResponse.title: ValidateSrcTagInjectionResponse

message.description:
Status about src script tag injected in customer's webpage

Example: ` "injected"`
message.title: Message
